sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnntwrksvcmntrng ( SYS_IP /* */ , SYS_PORT /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #sysIp# /* */ , #sysPort# /* */ , #sysNm# /* */ , #mngrNm# /* */ , #mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , #mntrngSttus# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnntwrksvcmntrng SET SYS_IP=#sysIp# /* */ , SYS_PORT=#sysPort# /* */ , SYS_NM=#sysNm# /* */ , MNGR_NM=#mngrNm# /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS=#mntrngSttus# /* */ , CREAT_DT=#creatDt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE SYS_IP=#sysIp# /* */ AND SYS_PORT=#sysPort# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrng WHERE SYS_IP=#sysIp# /* */ AND SYS_PORT=#sysPort# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SYS_IP /* */ , SYS_PORT /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrng WHERE SYS_IP=#sysIp# /* */ AND SYS_PORT=#sysPort# /* */

SELECT SYS_IP /* */ , SYS_PORT /* */ , SYS_NM /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrng WHERE 1=1
SYS_IP = #searchKeyword# /* */
SYS_PORT LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SYS_IP DESC /* */ , SYS_PORT DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
